name: buildkite

alias.title: Credential Alias
alias.description: Friendly identifier for this Buildkite organization.

apiToken.title: API Token
apiToken.description: Buildkite API token with read access to pipelines, teams, and build metadata.

teamSlug.title: Team Slug
teamSlug.description: Optional team slug used to scope which pipelines are synchronized.

pipelineSlug.title: Pipeline Slug
pipelineSlug.description: Optional pipeline slug when limiting sync to a single pipeline.

syncInterval.title: Sync Interval
syncInterval.description: Optional duration string indicating how frequently Buildkite metadata should be refreshed.

description: Collect Buildkite organization and pipeline context to support CI security and compliance posture reporting.
